Synopsis: Creates a new HTML page with specified content, name, title, file path, and ID.
Description: This function creates a new HTML page with the provided content and metadata. It generates a unique GUID for the page and stores it in the global schema. The function returns a custom object representing the page.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Hello, World!

" } -Name "index" -Title "Welcome Page" -FilePath "C:\Pages\index.html" -ID "12345" Creates a new HTML page with a simple "Hello, World!" content, named "index", titled "Welcome Page", saved at "C:\Pages\index.html", and with ID "12345".
